rows.label: qst104211_msg0001
rows.name:
Green winds caress my hair;
the breath of Gula...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, Gula, Gula... Sunlight through
the trees, like a mother. A great
tree, like a father...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0003
rows.name:
I am putting the natural
beauty of Gula into words.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0004
rows.name:
I wish the children of the city
would also richly express the
scenery of their homeland.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0005
rows.name:
But it seems they all prefer feeling
nature with their bodies to weaving
words... They pay me no mind...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0006
rows.name: A teacher in Iyasaki Village? Me?

rows.label: qst104211_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh...! The guidance of the
Divine Beasts! The currents
of the Cloud Sea!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0008
rows.name:
However, I am in debt... I cannot
leave here until I pay it off.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0009
rows.name: It's 7,500G... What should I do...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0010
rows.name: Pay 7,500G?

rows.label: qst104211_msg0011
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst104211_msg0012
rows.name: Don't pay

rows.label: qst104211_msg0081
rows.name:
Skipping work to indulge in
my hobbies... I'm hardly suited
to be a teacher, am I...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0101
rows.name:
A teacher... What a
pleasant-sounding word.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0102
rows.name:
However, I cannot leave
behind a debt of 7,500G...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0301
rows.name:
Oh! As if stars were falling
from the heavens, 7,500G has
descended before me!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0302
rows.name:
With this, I can settle my
debts and head to Iyasaki
Village with a fresh start.

rows.label: qst104211_msg0303
rows.name:
Then I shall pack my things at once
and head for Iyasaki Village!

rows.label: qst104211_msg0401
rows.name:
I need to pay back my debt soon or
the boss will be angry... Guess I'll
have to resign myself to working...

rows.label: qst104211_msg0501
rows.name:
If only there were an opportunity to
teach my knowledge and experience
somewhere... but such chances are rare...
